name: Kim Possible: Legend of the Monkey's Eye
summary: Kim Possible: Legend of the Monkey's Eye is just what you'd expect from a Kim Possible action game, a lot of twitching fingers on the commands, the need for precise timing, and, of course, monkies!! Many, many monkies. Oh, and puns of course. Usually bad ones, which means you'll groan while you are laughing. You know, like the storyline starts with “legends speak of an ancient Monkey King who ruled over Noh Goh”. Yep, I heard it. You groaned.
info:
• 中文名: 麻辣女孩：猴眼传说
